text: Buettneria is a monotypic genus of bush cricket or katydid, in the tribe Phaneropterini, found in the Democratic Republic of the Congo and Cameroon;Bisby F.A., Roskov Y.R., Orrell T.M., Nicolson D., Paglinawan L.E., Bailly N., Kirk P.M., Bourgoin T., Baillargeon G., Ouvrard D. (18 September 2011);Species 2000 & ITIS Catalogue of Life: 2011 Annual Checklist.. Species 2000: Reading, UK. the single species is Buettneria maculiceps. ==References== Category:Insects of Cameroon Category:Tettigoniinae Category:Insects described in 1889 Category:Insects of the Democratic Republic of the Congo
title: Buettneria (genus)
